episodes.title: 241 Years in Prison | Ngcobo Massacre: The Cult That Killed Cops
episodes.description:
In this chilling report, Ivy Smithy revisits the shocking case of the Ngcobo Massacre—where a religious cult, the Seven Angels Ministry, ambushed a South African police station, killing five officers. One of the key members was sentenced to a staggering 241 years in prison.
What drove this deadly act? And how did justice unfold?
